title: Match Bases and Solve for x
text: Since both sides has the same base, we can take out the logarithm and get $$x^2=64$$. Solve for $$x^2=64$$ which gives $$x=-8$$ and $$x=8$$. Given $$\log_{a}\left(b\right)$$, b can not be negative. We can omit the negative answer. Therefore $$x=8$$ is the only solution for this equation.
